narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Pre-License inspection. 
 
This is a 2nd Pre-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. This site 002 is ready to be licensed under the AWA. All sites included in application must demonstrate 
compliance under the AWA before a license will be issued. The applicant has until 24 June 2024 to demonstrate 
compliance or the applicant will forfeit the license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. 
 
Once all sites have demonstrated compliance under the AWA, a copy of your license will be sent to you without any 
additional action on your part. If you have not received your license within 30 days of complete compliance demonstration, 
please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
